name: 楊勝明
objective:
1) 電磁能量轉換
2) 感應馬達運轉原理
3) 變頻控制
4) 複數向量模式
5) 向量控制原理
6) 三相交流電流控制
7) PWM轉換器原理
8) 感應馬達參數量測
9) 弱磁控制原理
schedule:
1.Electromagnetic energy conversion
2.Magnetic circuit
3.Induction machine theory
4.Variable voltage variable frequency control
5.Complex vector model
6.Complex vector model
7.Principle of vector control
8.Principle of vector control
9.Mid-term Exam
10.Three-phase current control
11.Three-phase current control
12.PWM inverter
13.SVPWM
14.Field weakening control
15.Field weakening control
16.Motor parameter measurement
17.Sensorless Control
18.Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Home Work：30 ％
Mid-Term Exam：35％
Final Exam：35％
materials: Text: Vector Control and Dynamics of AC Drives, by D. Novotny and T. Lipo, Oxford University Press
